  • Campus Life
    • Menu
    • Campus Life With three 3 campuses located in Lisbon, Oeiras and Loures, Técnico becomes a reality full of contrasts between the proximity of the Atlantic Ocean and the Tagus River as well as the center of Lisbon, providing this way an unique experience.
